resources.string: You need to be connected to the Internet to play Ring Escape!
GPS must be enabled in your device settings to play Ring Escape!
Mock Locations must be enabled in your device settings if you want to play a virtual game!
Sorry, the IP address of the Server can only contain digits and dots (IPv4 style: xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)

Ring Escape is a location-based internet application, developed for the purposes of my Bachelor Thesis at the Technological Educational Institute of Athens, supervised by Lecturer, Dr Ioannis Voyiatzis and Mr George Meletiou. Your location will be transmitted to a central server and to other players only during the game. At the end of each game all location data will be deleted. It is recommended that you turn off automatic switching of screen orientation in your device settings to prevent unexpected behavior. Enjoy the app!\n\n Johny
